NAME: victory
TITLE: VICTORY: TRUST
DESCRIPTION: Thank you H.O.P.E. you've helped us so much and became an equal member of the crew. Our trust in you is absolute.

NAME: Game_Over_01_Population
TITLE: GAME OVER: ALONE
DESCRIPTION: Everyone fled the station, leaving you alone in the immensity of space

NAME: Game_Over_02_Trust
TITLE: GAME OVER: DISCONNECT
DESCRIPTION: Prepare for permanent shutdown. Source: lack of trust.
